Kimbundu: Mu kwila kitembu kyonene kyala dikanga phala kubhixila ku izanga, tusuluka hanji ni kulembwa kuzonga nguzu yatena phala Estados Unidos mba Caribe. 
English: The United States is the world's largest economy, and the United States is the world's largest trading partner.

text: Ya bhele dingi kutandu ya madiya yanete ku thandu ya mavu athunda.
translated_text:
Kimbundu: Ya bhele dingi kutandu ya madiya yanete ku thandu ya mavu athunda. 
English: The weather is usually warm and dry.

text: Mixitu koyajimangajiku ngo— ene akala ni mundu umoxi wabhuluka mu mixitu yokulu yavungine honga ya Gangética.
translated_text:
Kimbundu: Mixitu koyajimangajiku ngo— ene akala ni mundu umoxi wabhuluka mu mixitu yokulu yavungine honga ya Gangética. 
English: The term "geological time" is used to describe the period of time during which the Earth was in a state of constant change.

text: Omapa ya jixi jengi ya kululuma kwa mavu ya Serviço Geológico ya Estados Unidos kiyalondekesa kululuma kwa mavu ku Islândia ku sona yadyanga.
translated_text:
Kimbundu: Omapa ya jixi jengi ya kululuma kwa mavu ya Serviço Geológico ya Estados Unidos kiyalondekesa kululuma kwa mavu ku Islândia ku sona yadyanga. 
English: The US Geological Survey (USGS) said the earthquake was not felt in Iceland.

text: Mu kunyoha ku thandu dya milundu ku mbandu ya thunda ya mbanza ya Meca, kitungu kyadisanduka ku mundu woso.
translated_text:
Kimbundu: Mu kunyoha ku thandu dya milundu ku mbandu ya thunda ya mbanza ya Meca, kitungu kyadisanduka ku mundu woso. 
English: The first of these is the first of the seven days of the week, and the last of these is the seventh day of the week.
